title: MASTERCOOL (59861 Blue R410A, R22, R404A 3-Way Manifold Set with 3-1/8" Gauges and 60" Hoses
features: SOLID ALUMINUM DESIGN with full 3/8” bore all the way through the block to increase flow over standard block designs
3 1/8” SILICONE DAMPENED GAUGES smooth out needle movement while the color coding of R410a, R22 and R404A provides immediate refrigerant recognition

GRADE 5 LEVEL ¼” SAE HIGH PRESSURE HOSES with manual ball valves use the highest technology rubber materials giving the hoses the most flexibility and reducing the risk of kinking also included is a 3/8” SAE black vacuum hose
BALL VALVE rotates 90˚ between two teflon washers requiring little effort to turn, even under pressure
description: • 3 1/8" gauges• 1/4″ MFL• Exclusive 3/8″ ball valve design• Full 3/8″ bore all the way through the block increases flow over the standard block designs• Ball valve rotates 90˚ between two teflon washers requiring little effort to turn, even under pressure• Opens and closes quickly with only a quarter turn• Visual knob position quickly indicates if valves are open or closed• Color coordinated gauges for multi-refrigerant recognitionR22, R404A, R410A 3-Way 3/8" Ball Valve Manifold Gauge Set includes 3 - 60", 1/4" SAE ball valve hoses with manual shut-off valves, 1 - 3/8" SAE vacuum hose and 90˚ swivel vacuum ball valve packaged in a plastic box.
